item.title: Heytaco Anywhere
item.description: Heytaco Anywhere is the 3rd party App of HeyTaco! to give ðŸŒ® in other services.

item.title: Get started
item.description: Let’s install Heytaco Anywhere. In this example, we’re going to connect Slack with Github.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Heytaco Anywhere is connected by OAuth. It is necessary to configure Slack or Microsoft Teams.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Basically, Heytaco Anywhere is self-managed service. So it is necesary to install in your infrastructure.

item.title: Reference
item.description: Index of server configuration settings. These configurations are injected by environment variables.
